name: Saving Pogoland - with princess Flowerbud
description:
After Pogoland is attacked by mysterious monsters, it is YOUR destiny to save all the Pogo's and drive this evil from the land!

Take control of Princess Flowerbud and cleanse the corrupted inhabitants of your kingdom, while fighting your fear of small spaces! Jump, run, and shred air-guitar through these hard-to-beat levels, and try to find the secret boss fight!*

Enjoy the hard fun of playing through levels that will make you think: "Surely Satan designed these!"

A game by: Anders Hansen, Jonas Lauridsen, Martin Viktor, Slavomir Baca, and Stefan Tanderup

*A boss fight so secret that not even the developers know of it's existence.
